Module img2char¶

The module img2char contains all the modules for processing the license plate and it returns an str of the 4 digits and 3 letters in case of matching.

There is basically a function called img2char that mainly combines the function to trim and split digits to process the matching:

img2char.img2char(img)[source]¶

This is the final module that contains merges all the modules together to get the digits of the car plate.

It compares the digits splited with the patterns loaded and the licence plate must have 4 digits and 3 letters, if the maching doesn’t recognizes anything it will add ‘?’

Parameters:img (file) – Image file name
Returns:The number of the license plate
Return type:str

Note

As the maximum limit of 500KB, we cannot put the following images files, but the images are those provided for us to make and test the project.

$ python ~/GitProjects/Projecte/img2char.py
$ python img2char.py
